entities.name: SEATTLE
entities.description: City in Washington where a significant portion of the company's research and development activities and business operations are located.

entities.name: SILICON VALLEY
entities.description: Region in California where the company has significant business operations, which is seismically active.

entities.name: COVID-19
entities.description: Global pandemic that continues to impact the company's business operations, including its employees, customers, partners, and communities.

relationships.relationship_description: Both Seattle and Silicon Valley are significant locations for the company's business operations and are seismically active regions.
The COVID-19 pandemic has impacted business operations in Seattle, including employees, customers, and partners.
The COVID-19 pandemic has impacted business operations in Silicon Valley, including employees, customers, and partners.
